page.title: 08Travel in Ref.02760084
page.content: Two main roads serve the area,the A382 Moreton to Bovey Tracey in the Wray valley and the B3212 Moreton to Exeter which climbs to Cossick Cross then drops to Doccombe. Single decker buses run on weekdays, 2 each way on the A382 and 4 each way on the B3212.School buses to local State schools and Hospital car service are available.The majority of house_ holders own a car and consider it essential. Narrow lanes wind all over the area, determined by the lie of land.They are well maintained,frequently single track,sunken between stone walls and hedges. Away from the main roads the traffic is sparse,farm vehicles and local cars The two main roads carry heavier traffic than they were built for especially in holiday periods.
